title: Replace Google Maps iframe with exact coordinate-based link

requirements.text: Remove the existing Google Maps iframe from the Contact component
acceptanceCriteria: The iframe element displaying the Google Maps embed is completely removed from the Contact component
No remnants of the previous map implementation remain in the component

requirements.text: Add a clickable link in the Contact component that opens Google Maps at the exact coordinates 25.039202,73.912804 using the URL https://maps.google.com/?q=25.039202,73.912804

quotes:
Add this exact Google Maps link:
https://maps.google.com/?q=25.039202,73.912804

acceptanceCriteria: A clickable link element is added to the Contact component
The link href attribute is exactly https://maps.google.com/?q=25.039202,73.912804
The coordinates 25.039202,73.912804 are preserved exactly as specified
The link opens in a new tab (target='_blank' with rel='noopener noreferrer')
The link styling is consistent with the existing dark luxury theme (black/gold/white color palette)
The link is appropriately labeled (e.g., 'View on Google Maps' or 'Get Directions')

constraints: Do not modify the coordinates 25.039202,73.912804 in any way
Maintain the existing dark luxury theme styling in the Contact section
Preserve all other Contact section functionality (phone number, contact form, WhatsApp button, Instagram link)
nonGoals: Adding additional map functionality beyond the link
Modifying other sections of the website
Changing the Contact section layout significantly
